document.docAuthor: Glowska, Eliza, Chrzanowski, Mateusz & Kaszewska, Katarzyna
document.masterDocTitle: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Checklist of the Quill mites (Acariformes: Syringophilidae) of the World

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Neosyringophilopsis
Skoracki and Sikora, 2005
: 22
. Type-species:
Neosyringophilopsis acanthizus
Skoracki and Sikora, 2005
, by original designation.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU , paratypes : females at AMU , ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Acanthiza inornata
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Acanthizidae ), type-locality: AUSTRALIA , New Holland (
Skoracki & Sikora 2005
).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
aegithali (
Bochkov, Mironov and Skoracki, 2001
)
,
Syringophilopsis aegythali
Bochkov, Mironov and Skoracki, 2001
: 235
, fig. 6 ;
Neosyringophilopsis aegithali,
Skoracki & Sikora 2005
: 26
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at ZISP (T-Sy- 21 ), paratypes : females, male at ZISP , AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Aegithalos caudatus
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Aegithalidae ), type-locality: RUSSIA , Novogrod Prov., Chudovo Distr., Oskuy village (Bochkov et al. 2001 ); POLAND , Swinoujscie ( AMU ) (Skoracki 2004 b), ENGLAND (
Nattress & Skoracki 2009
).

garrulaxi (
Bochkov, Mironov and Skoracki, 2001
)
,
Syringophilopsis garrulaxi
Bochkov, Mironov and Skoracki, 2001
: 236
, figs. 7–9 ;
Neosyringophilopsis garrulaxi,
Skoracki & Sikora 2005
: 26
.
Type material.
Holotype female at ZISP (T-Sy- 22 ), paratypes : females, males at ZISP , AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Trochalopteron affine
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Leiothrichidae ), type-locality: NEPAL , S. Mustang, Kolopani (Bochkov et al. 2001 ).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
locustellus (Skoracki, 2004 )
,
Syringophilopsis locustellus Skoracki, 2004 : 51
, figs. 13–20 ;
Neosyringophilopsis locustellus,
Skoracki & Sikora 2005
: 26
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 22.1), paratypes : females, male, nymphs, larvae at AMU , ZISP , SNM .

Hosts and distribution.
Locustella naevia
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Locustellidae ), type-locality: POLAND , Swinoujscie (Skoracki 2004 b);
L. luscinioides
( Locustellidae ), POLAND , Swinoujscie, ( AMU ) (Skoracki 2004 b). Habitat. Secondary feathers.

Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 129 ), paratypes : females, males at AMU , MRAC , ZISP . Hosts and distribution.
Spermestes cucullata
( type host) ( Passeriformes : Estrildidae ), type-locality: unknown (Skoracki 2008 c).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
lybidus
Skoracki, Klimovičová, Muchai and Hromada, 2014
: 180
, figs. 2, 3 .
Type material.
Holotype female at AMU (Syr. 444 ), paratypes female and male at AMU , ZISP , NMK . Hosts and distribution.
Pogoniulus bilineatus
( type host) ( Piciformes : Lybiidae ), type locality: KENYA , Ewaso Nigro River, W. Naro Moru (
Skoracki et al . 2014 a
).

phylloscopi (
Bochkov, Mironov and Skoracki, 2001
)
,
Syringophilopsis phylloscopi
Bochkov, Mironov and Skoracki, 2001
: 234
, figs. 1–4 ;
Neosyringophilopsis phylloscopi,
Skoracki & Sikora 2005
: 26
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Holotype female at ZISP (T-Sy- 20 ), paratypes : females, male at ZISP , AMU . Hosts and distribution.
Phylloscopus collybita
( Passeriformes : Phylloscopidae ), type-locality: FRANCE , Brittany, Ille-et-Vilaine, St. Malo (Bochkov et al. 2001 ), POLAND , Pomorskie, Mierzeja Wislana, ( ZISP , AMU ) (Bochkov et al. 2001 );
Ph . trochilus
( Phylloscopidae ), POLAND , Darlowsko Wschodnie, Kopan, ( ZISP , AMU ) (Skoracki 2004 b), SLOVAKIA , Cigelka, ( AMU ) (Skoracki 2011 b).

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
troglodytis (
Fritsch, 1958
)
,
Syringophilus troglodytis
Fritsch, 1958
: 238
, fig. 8 ;
Syringophilopsis troglodytis,
Bochkov & Mironov 1998
: 5
;
Neosyringophilopsis troglodytis,

: 26
.
Type material.
Lost (
Kethley 1970
).
